DOC.detailed_description: Design : randomize , single blind , control trial . The main goal study compare exercise tolerance COPD patient 8 week pulmonary rehabilitation program use High Flow Nasal Cannula The Venturi Mask . The exercise tolerance measure second Constant Load Treadmill Test ( CTLT ) .
